mil3.6.5:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.6.5:1.4_0: “But sir, is there any accomplishment in the Buddha’s full ordination? Or does it not exist?”
mil3.6.5:1.5_0: “Great king, the Buddha has allowed the Bodhi tree downstairs for his disciples. He has not been given up for life to others with the Buddha, and he did not think of anyone.”
